msml:element.name: displacementConstraint
msml:element.description: Sets the displacement for specified nodes. The displacement vector can either be the same for all nodes (i.e. one triple) or one displacement vector has to be specified for each node.

meta.value: Set indices of displaced points separated by spaces.
Set the displacement vector of the points given in the indices. Either provide one displacement for all points (DIM = 3) or a displacement triple for each point (DIM = 3*DIM(indices)).
